talk.author: did:plc:yzxtjv67kfgn4qwgbjjxheca
talk.utter: Journalists and reporters are wasting away because American citizenship chose pablum years ago.

talk.author: did:plc:6m265e37be35znfdhhex2ixd
talk.utter: I agree! This election needs to serve as a wake up call for us all to demand more professionalism from our press, by way of more voices and contributions from those who have been trained in journalistic investigations, integrity and ethics. We will never get that from pundits.

talk.author: did:plc:yzxtjv67kfgn4qwgbjjxheca
talk.utter: People poopoo on training today but it is the foundation of good journalism. No one wants a lawyer who's not been to law school or a doctor who is not trained and practiced. "News" is not someone's opinion wrapped around a factoid. I want facts with details and data.
